description: Access current weather data for any location on Earth including over 200,000 cities!

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "openweathermap" WITH KEY = "sys_country"
list.label: Country
list.name: country
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "openweathermap" WITH KEY = "sys_country"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "openweathermap" WITH KEY = "name"
list.label: City
list.name: city
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "openweathermap" WITH KEY = "name"
list.tagValuesQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "openweathermap" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE sys_country = '$tag'
list.tagsQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "openweathermap" WITH KEY = "sys_country"

title: Open Weather Map
